headline: Franklin BSP Realty Trust, Inc. Announces Acquisition of NewPoint Holdings JV LLC
summary: NEW YORK, March 10, 2025--Franklin BSP Realty Trust, Inc. (NYSE: FBRT) ("FBRT" or the "Company"), a leading real estate investment trust, today announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire NewPoint Holdings JV LLC ("NewPoint"), a privately held commercial real estate finance company headquartered in Plano, Texas. The transaction is expected to close in the third quarter of 2025, subject to customary closing conditions, including regulatory approvals.
